# [[open relationship]] {{gloss|romantic and/or sexual relationship in which the people involved are permitted or tolerated to be available to have additional simultaneous romantic and/or sexual relationships}}
types.html:
relation libre f (plural relations libres)

  1. open relationship (romantic and/or sexual relationship in which the people involved are permitted or tolerated to be available to have additional simultaneous romantic and/or sexual relationships)

title: relation libre
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ʁə.la.sjɔ̃ libʁ/
